DeepL.dsc: High-quality text translation with contextual understanding.
DeepL.limit: Free plan limits the number of characters translated per month.

LibreTranslate.dsc: Free translation API for multiple languages.
LibreTranslate.limit: Limited to a certain number of translations per day in the free plan.

Microsoft Translator API.dsc: Offers AI-powered text translation in real-time.
Microsoft Translator API.limit: Free plan allows 2 million characters per month.
